summary: The diff implements a laser cutting artworks showcase website with homepage, gallery, about, services, and contact pages. While most frontend requirements are addressed, there are gaps in backend contact form implementation and potential issues with image asset paths and gallery functionality.

missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo file shows contact inquiry types and storage structures, but no public shared function to receive and store contact form submissions is visible in the truncated diff. Only types (ContactInquiry, ContactInquiryInput) and state (contactInquiries map) are defined.

missing_requirements.requirement: Products show high-quality images with descriptions
missing_requirements.reason: GalleryPage.tsx is mentioned as added but content is omitted from diff. Cannot verify if product descriptions accompany images or if the three categories are properly implemented with descriptions.
ContactPage.tsx is mentioned in routes but its implementation is omitted from diff. Cannot verify form validation logic for name, email, phone, and message fields.
ContactPage.tsx implementation is not shown in diff. Cannot verify if success confirmation is displayed after form submission.

hallucinated_features.description: Dance class booking system with sessions, instructors, video lessons, and Stripe payment integration
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend implements extensive dance class functionality including DanceClass, Session, Booking, VideoLesson types, class management, session scheduling, and payment processing. This is completely unrelated to a laser cutting artworks showcase website and was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: User authentication system with role-based access control (student, instructor, admin)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user authentication or account management as a non-goal. However, backend implements UserProfile with role field, access control, and multiple authentication-related components exist in frontend.
Non-goal specifies no user authentication, but diff shows ProfileSetupDialog.tsx and RegistrationForm.tsx components.

hallucinated_features.description: Booking management system with booking reminders
hallucinated_features.reason: Components like BookingButton.tsx, BookingReminderChecker.tsx, and BookingReminderManager.tsx implement functionality not requested for a laser cutting showcase website.

hallucinated_features.description: Instructor panels and class editor dialogs
hallucinated_features.reason: Components like SessionRosterPanel.tsx and ClassEditorDialog.tsx are for managing dance classes, which is unrelated to the laser cutting artworks showcase requirement.
